## ProgramBuilder.greaterThan() method

return true if x is greater than y, otherwise false, per component

**Signature:**

```typescript
greaterThan(x: number | PBShaderExp, y: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  y | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
